revised_title: Corrections and Additions to Biographical Memoirs
tldr: This article provides corrections and additional information to the biographical memoirs of fellows of the Royal Society. It mentions the appointment of Walter Hayman and D. R. Cox by Harry Jones, and it corrects errors in Leslie Harold Martin's address. It also discusses Martin's work in the Cavendish Laboratory and his involvement with Tesla transformers and high-voltage generators.
scientific_discipline: Biographies and Book Reviews > History of Science
